column4: im having an error "configure: error: C compiler cannot create executable" gawk, and gcc are installed. this happens with the ./configure (so im not even able to procede with make) im actually trying to install FUSE, but this error is happening on other packages too.  is anyone familiar with this?  i'm new to ubuntu
open a terminal and do: 'sudo apt-get install build-essential'
compiling anything without it is annoying
